column5: Found this little fella hidden inside my satellite dish...  Any idea as to what species of toad this is?    G
not a toad , it's a tree frog
Yupp, that's a gray tree frog, I've seen many in the area and used to be a favorite of mine to find when i was a little kid  Sometimes they get a little  green to them, pretty cool animals
So that's the little sucker keeping me up at night! Thanks fellas, luckily he found another place to hide out  G
Yes they make quite the racket.  I have several in and around my back yard.  My favorite frog for sure..
I think you should name him Jeffery.
Gerritt, I think it might be an Atlantic.
LMAO Some have to remember this oldie.
I have also been seeing a lot of them this year. Sometimes in the strangest places.

One of those pissed in my 3 year olds eye a couple months ago. He said he could't see/eyes were red and foaming from the mouth, my wife called poison control and they said they will give those effects but harmless anyways, its more a defence for animals that try to eat them, they pee in there mouth get a nasty taste and start foaming. Notice dogs only try it once haha  Seems there are some deadly ones in South america. Kid still grabs every toad/frog he sees
that would be a fish bait frog.........j/k can't use tree frogs as bait

Kid still grabs every toad/frog he sees Thx for the morning laugh. Boys will always be boys.  And thx Brian for the singing frog... put a grin on my face.  Nice picture too G. Thx for sharing.  I have never seen one in person myself....but I'll keep looking.

One of those pissed in my 3 year olds eye a couple months ago. He said he could't see/eyes were red and foaming from the mouth, my wife called poison control and they said they will give those effects but harmless anyways, its more a defence for animals that try to eat them, they pee in there mouth get a nasty taste and start foaming. Notice dogs only try it once haha  Seems there are some deadly ones in South america. Kid still grabs every toad/frog he sees  Yeah if you're stranded in the bush, you can dip makeshift spears in the frog's mouth to make deadly poisonous weapons. Kill a buck in an instant. The mouth foam can be used as shampoo.  Totally just made that up, hopefully it sounded cool.
